overview:
As Executive Vice President, Silvia brings over 25 years experience in sales and business development to Visio2. Silvia joined the team from Distrosur where she served as the Director of Business Development and played an instrumental role in the companyâ€™s dramatic growth.

During her tenure at Distrosur, Silvia (and her team) was responsible for over 20 Million in new revenue opportunities in their core businesses. Prior to Distrosur, Silvia Corti served as Regional Development Manager for Etam bringing in new revenues & stores such as Middle-regionâ€™s Argentinaâ€™s MArket.

Silvia studied in the Academy of Arts in Mendoza, Argentina.
